intro: Sideritis × gaditana, commonly known as the hybrid sages, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It belongs to the Lamiaceae family, which includes many aromatic herbs. The plant produces small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained soils and prefers sunny to partially shaded environments. Sideritis × gaditana is often used in traditional medicine for its potential health benefits.
